q: Google's day-to-day operations as CEO, replacing Eric Schmidt , who will assume the role of chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, in particular working on new products. Larry Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. Search ads remain the company's primary source of revenue, but investors have been worried by metrics indicating the pace of growth is slowing. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the Government. During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism.
